name: Chaim Lev-Ari
title: Head of R&D
shortBio: Chaim is a highly-skilled, self taught Full Stack Developer, fluent in JavaScript, and works with many web programming languages and technologies like, .Net, Python, AngularJS, and React. He works on smart contract and front-end development, and many other Tezos ecosystem projects. With Elie, he founded Bakery-IL, a proof-of-stake service with reliable delegation.
